member.name: IMFSampleOutputStream.BeginWriteSample
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request to write a media sample to the stream.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the sample.
A pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

A pointer to the interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSampleOutputStream.EndWriteSample
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to write a media sample to the stream.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSampleOutputStream
member.summary: Writes media samples to a byte stream.
